Package com.salesforce.androidsdk.store

Class Summary
DBOpenHelper Helper class to manage SmartStore's database creation and version management.
SmartStore Smart store Provides a secure means for SalesforceMobileSDK Container-based applications to store objects in a persistent and searchable manner.
SmartStore.IndexSpec Simple class to represent index spec
SmartStore.QuerySpec Simple class to represent a query spec
 

Enum Summary
DBHelper SmartStore Database Helper Singleton class that provides helpful methods for accessing the database underneath the SmartStore It also caches a number of of things to speed things up (e.g.
SmartStore.Order Simple class to represent query order (used by QuerySpec)
SmartStore.QueryType Query type enum
SmartStore.Type Enum for column type
 

Exception Summary
SmartStore.SmartStoreException Exception thrown by smart store
